title: Display PlateCommands commands
description: Display all the available commands to the requesting player. The list will be built based on player permissions.

title: Create PlateAction
description: Create an pressure plate at your current location which when walked upon will execute the commands provided. Commands are semicolon ; separated and can include as many commands as you'd like. The %player% placeholder can be used to insert the Player's name who walked upon the pressure plate.

title: Display Command Help
description: Display helpful information about the specified command, including syntax and an example.

title: Display PlateAction Info
description: When looking at a registered PlateAction, display a summary of the details.

title: Reload the PlateCommands configuration.
description: Reload each of the PlateCommands configuration files; changes made to the config.yml and strings.yml will be immediately applied.
